english: Taiwanese beverage chain Xing Fu Tang

etymology.interpretation: 幸福堂(幸福堂) (xìngfú táng, "Xing Fu Tang") can be interpreted as a 'hall of happiness,' evoking a sense of joyful experiences and pleasant ambiance associated with enjoying delicious drinks at this popular Taiwanese beverage chain.

examples.chinese: 我喜欢去幸福堂(我喜歡去幸福堂)，喝奶茶(喝奶茶)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān qù Xìngfú Táng, hē nǎichá.
examples.english: I like to go to Xing Fu Tang and drink milk tea.

examples.chinese: 她推荐去幸福堂(她推薦去幸福堂)，品尝招牌饮品(品嚐招牌飲品)。
examples.pinyin: Tā tuījiàn qù Xìngfú Táng, pǐncháng zhāopái yǐnpǐn.
examples.english: She recommends going to Xing Fu Tang and tasting the signature drink.

examples.chinese: 幸福堂在台湾非常受欢迎(幸福堂在臺灣非常受歡迎)。
examples.pinyin: Xìngfú Táng zài Táiwān fēicháng shòu huānyíng.
examples.english: Xing Fu Tang is very popular in Taiwan.
